attributes.action: Make Prison a 'Hell on Earth' Once Again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why has the system in prison gone pear shaped? Because it is overcrowded. 

Why is it overcrowded? Because nobody is scared of prison any more, a 'holiday' for them if you will. 

These people who have committed a crime are NOT paying the price. 

If someone murders someone else, it's 'life'. ie 40 years. But the moment they walk through the doors, its halved. THEN if they're "good boys/girls" its even shorter. So that's about...10 years for taking a persons life.

In that duration they get amenities that    hard working people couldn't even dream about. 
I feel they should be made to eat 'slop', have no privacy, and do all the rubbish jobs that no honest person should have to do.
None of the Xboxes and televisions that they have now. 

They should hate prison so much that they NEVER want to go back. 

What should our government do about it?
Make prison a 'hell on Earth' as it used to be. 

No one should 'mind' going to prison.
